feed.title: International Journal of Adolescent Medicine and Health
feed.subtitle: A RSS feed containing the latest articles published in International Journal of Adolescent Medicine and Health

entry.title: Effects of anti-obesity drugs on cardiometabolic risk factors in pediatric population with obesity: a systematic review and meta-analysis of randomized controlled trials

entry.title: ‘We need transparency and communication to build trust’: exploring access to primary care services for young adults through community-based youth participatory action research and group concept mapping
